item.title: VoltaGrid乘势而上，正权衡公开上市或出售事宜
item.description: VoltaGrid是一家初创公司，为科技企业提供运行人工智能系统所需能源的捷径，目前正探索筹集数十亿美元资金以维持其增长。【原文：VoltaGrid, a startup that offers tech companies a shortcut to the energy needed to run artificial-intelligence systems, is exploring ways to raise billions of dollars to sustain its growth.】

item.title: 白宫经济学家称Citrini人工智能报告为"科幻小说"
item.description: 白宫一位顶级经济学家将周末关于人工智能风险的报告称为"科幻小说"，该报告曾引发股市剧烈波动。【原文：A top White House economist dubbed the weekend report about artificial intelligence risks that had roiled the stock market “science fiction.”】

item.title: German Government Waters Down Controversial Heating Law
item.description: 德国政府同意废除一项备受争议的禁令，该禁令曾禁止安装新的燃气和燃油供暖系统。此举源于总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨领导的保守派政党正全力兑现一项关键的竞选承诺。【原文：The German government agreed to abolish a controversial ban on new gas and oil heating systems as Chancellor Friedrich Merz’ conservatives rush to deliver on a key electoral promise.】

item.title: Telecom Italia Sets €400 Million Stock Buyback, Reverse Split
item.description: 意大利电信公司董事会提议实施最高4亿欧元（约合4.71亿美元）的股票回购计划，并推行1股拆10股的反向股票分割，旨在通过资产剥离后重整股权结构。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA’s board proposed an up to €400 million ($471 million) stock buyback and a 1-for-10 reverse stock split, moving to overhaul its equity profile after selling off assets.】

item.title: 人类因素助推汤森路透股价成为最新AI赢家
item.description: 焦躁不安的投资者正四处物色人工智能领域的获利机会，当汤森路透的法律工具获得人工智能巨头Anthropic PBC的赞誉后，投资者们便纷纷涌向该公司。【原文：Jittery investors scanning the horizon for winning artificial intelligence bets glommed on to Thomson Reuters Corp. after its legal tools earned kudos from AI juggernaut Anthropic PBC.】

item.title: 美国认定印度、印尼、老挝对太阳能产业实施不公平补贴
item.description: 特朗普政府认定印度、印度尼西亚和老挝对太阳能制造业实施了不公平补贴，这一决定虽可能提升美国生产商的竞争力，却可能推高消费者成本。【原文：The Trump administration determined that India, Indonesia and Laos unfairly subsidized solar manufacturing, a decision that will likely boost US producers’ competitiveness but threatens to increase consumer costs.】

item.title: 特朗普与美国现状指南
item.description:
今日《大事件》聚焦：特朗普预计将涉及哪些议题？这些议题如何揭示其政策优先级及其对本党的掌控力？

【原文：

Today on the Big Take: What Trump is expected to cover and what that reveals about his priorities and his grip on his party.

】

item.title: 丹·勒布称"失传的卖空艺术"正在卷土重来
item.description: Third Point LLC的丹·洛布表示，做空者正重新获得关注，因为押注于多年来令空头吃尽苦头的拥挤交易的机会正在浮现。【原文：Short sellers are becoming relevant again, says Third Point LLC’s Dan Loeb, as opportunities are emerging to bet against the crowded trades that have punished bears for years.】

item.title: 博阿兹·温斯坦警告称私募信贷基金"即将崩盘"
item.description: 激进投资者博阿兹·温斯坦正加大对私募信贷的警示力度，称围绕蓝猫资本基金的动荡正暴露这个1.8万亿美元行业更深层的裂痕。【原文：Activist investor Boaz Weinstein is stepping up his warnings on private credit, saying the turmoil surrounding Blue Owl Capital’s funds is exposing deeper cracks in the $1.8 trillion industry.】

item.title: 以色列计划增加美国小麦进口以争取关税减免
item.description: 以色列计划在食品和农产品领域向美国作出进一步贸易让步，作为说服其最亲密盟友降低对犹太国家出口关税努力的一部分。【原文：Israel plans to make further trade concessions to the US on food and agricultural goods, as part of efforts to persuade its closest ally to ease tariffs on exports from the Jewish state.】

item.title: 美国私立学校平均学费逼近5万美元历史新高
item.description: 据标普全球评级最新报告显示，美国私立学校的学费正逐步逼近5万美元大关。【原文：The cost of private school in the US is inching closer to $50,000, according to a new report by S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 蒙大拿州新输油管道提案重启基石XL项目
item.description: 南弓公司正考虑扩建其管道系统，这可能使被取消的基石XL项目以某种形式重启。【原文：South Bow Corp. is considering an expansion of its pipeline system that may revive a version of the canceled Keystone XL project.】

item.title: 阿尔诺对LVMH的掌控进一步加强，其持股比例已突破50%大关
item.description: 法国亿万富豪伯纳德·阿尔诺——欧洲首富——在兑现将持股比例提升至50%以上的承诺后，进一步巩固了对奢侈品集团LVMH的掌控权。【原文：French billionaire Bernard Arnault, Europe’s richest man, further tightened his grip on LVMH after he delivered on a promise to boost his holding in the luxury group beyond the 50% mark.】

item.title: 阿瑞斯公司着手将约翰·泰克斯特逐出足球帝国管理层
item.description: 在持续亏损及围绕这位信贷投资者最大体育投资项目之一的紧张局势下，阿瑞斯管理公司已采取行动削弱约翰·泰克斯特对其足球俱乐部集团的运营控制权。【原文：Ares Management Corp. has moved to weaken John Textor’s operational control of his football club group, after continued losses and tension over one of the credit investor’s biggest sports bets.】

item.title: Spirit与债券持有人达成协议，成功脱离破产程序
item.description: 精神航空控股公司周二宣布，已与债券持有人达成协议，这将使这家廉价航空公司能在今年晚些时候脱离破产程序。【原文：Spirit Aviation Holdings Inc. announced Tuesday that it has struck an agreement with noteholders that will allow the budget airline to exit bankruptcy later this year.】

item.title: 苹果投资者批准高管薪酬方案，否决中国提案
item.description: 根据初步统计结果，苹果公司股东投票批准了公司最新的高管薪酬方案，并否决了要求对公司中国业务进行审计的外部提案。【原文：Apple Inc. shareholders voted to approve the company’s latest executive pay packages and reject an outside proposal for an audit of the company’s China operations, according to preliminary tallies.】

item.title: 英格兰银行称企业可能通过裁员提升生产力
item.description: 英国央行正看到久违的生产力复苏迹象，英国企业正通过裁员来消除疫情后积累的过剩劳动力。【原文：The Bank of England is seeing signs of a long-awaited productivity revival as British firms lay off workers, in a “dishoarding“ of excess labor built up after the pandemic.】

item.title: 普利兹克斩获胜利，日本制造商进军芝加哥
item.description: 一家日本高精度机床制造商正将业务拓展至芝加哥，这对寻求连任的伊利诺伊州州长JB·普利兹克而言是一项胜利。【原文：A Japanese manufacturer of high-precision machine tools is expanding its business to Chicago, a win for Illinois Governor JB Pritzker, who is running for a third term.】

item.title: 廉价股票难觅踪影，投资者正撤离美国市场
item.description: 欧洲和日本具有吸引力的股票估值，对寻求美国股市之外投资机会的投资者极具吸引力。但坏消息是：这些低廉的估值正迅速消失。【原文：Attractive equity valuations in Europe and Japan were a big draw for investors looking beyond US stocks. The bad news: Those cheap price tags are fast disappearing.】

item.title: 美国贷款机构希望更像主权财富基金
item.description: 一份致员工的备忘录显示，一家传统上负责海外发展贷款的政府机构正致力于转型为类似主权财富基金的运作模式，这正是唐纳德·特朗普总统的核心目标之一。【原文：A government agency traditionally responsible for development lending abroad aims to be more like a sovereign wealth fund, a key goal of President Donald Trump, according to a memo to staff.】

item.title: 高盛即将进驻瑞信米兰办公室
item.description: 高盛集团即将入驻瑞士信贷集团位于意大利的总部大楼——这座米兰地标性办公楼，彰显了这家美国银行在意大利不断扩大的业务版图。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is set to move into the landmark Milan office that was Credit Suisse Group AG’s headquarters in Italy, underscoring the US bank’s growing footprint in the country.】

item.title: 法国电力价格跌至6月以来最低水平，太阳能发电量激增
item.description: 法国次月电力价格跌至6月以来最低水平，因太阳能发电量激增压低现货价格。【原文：French month-ahead power slid to the lowest since June as a surge in solar generation pushed down spot prices.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚对厄瓜多尔加征30%互惠关税，升级贸易争端
item.description: 哥伦比亚对厄瓜多尔的60余种商品征收30%的对等关税，加剧了两国之间的贸易争端。【原文：Colombia slapped 30% reciprocal tariffs on more than 60 goods from Ecuador, escalating a trade dispute between the two neighboring countries.】

item.title: MAGA登陆欧洲：特朗普特使撕毁外交手册
item.description: 至少比尔·怀特——特朗普派驻布鲁塞尔的大使——在因干涉比利时内政被外交部传唤时，还现身应召。【原文：At least Bill White, Donald Trump’s ambassador to Brussels, showed up when summoned by the foreign ministry over some undiplomatic interventions into Belgian politics.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数因就业前景改善而上升
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数在2月份小幅上升，原因是人们对经济前景、收入水平和就业市场持更乐观态度。【原文：US consumer confidence ticked up in February on more upbeat prospects for the economy, incomes and job market.】

item.title: 美国银行关键指标表现向好 尽管利润下滑——联邦存款保险公司称
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司数据显示，尽管整体利润小幅下滑，美国银行在第四季度的关键指标普遍实现增长，基础存款保险基金余额持续攀升。【原文：US banks showed broad gains in key metrics during the fourth quarter despite a modest decline in overall profit, and the bedrock deposit insurance fund’s balance continued to tick higher, according the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.】

item.title: 现代汽车力推氢能运输方案，与加拿大潜艇项目竞标挂钩
item.description: 据韩华海洋公司高管透露，现代汽车公司已提议在加拿大建设氢燃料电池基础设施，作为韩国竞标建造新型潜艇舰队合同的一部分。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. has proposed building hydrogen fuel-cell infrastructure in Canada as part of South Korea’s bid for a contract to build a new submarine fleet, according to an executive at Hanwha Ocean Co.】

item.title: 标普500指数上涨，交易员评估人工智能驱动的下跌带来的影响
item.description: 周二美股开盘小幅走高，交易员们正评估人工智能"恐慌性抛售"的前景——该抛售潮在前一交易日重创了市场。【原文：US stocks edged higher at the open on Tuesday as traders assessed the outlook for the artificial-intelligence “scare trade” that pummeled the market the prior session.】

item.title: 加拿大在特朗普威胁后批准所有湾流喷气机
item.description: 加拿大航空监管机构已认证了剩余的湾流私人飞机型号，此前美国总统特朗普曾声称加拿大拒绝批准这些型号，并警告将采取关税及其他报复性措施。【原文：Canada’s aviation regulator certified the remaining Gulfstream private jet models that US President Donald Trump said the country had declined to approve, and warned of tariffs and other retaliatory measures.】

item.title: 美国天然气交易清淡中下跌，因天气预报转暖
item.description: 美国天然气期货在清淡交易中下跌，因天气预报显示气温回升，表明供暖和发电厂燃料需求将下降。【原文：US natural gas futures declined in thin trading as weather forecasts shifted warmer, indicating lower demand for the heating and power-plant fuel.】
